quote: If you can’t handle the heat, you should probably move to another country.
author: Donald Trump

quote: I invented the internet, believe me. Nobody knew how to do it like me.
author: Donald Trump

quote: I have the best taste in fashion. No one’s even close.
author: Donald Trump

quote: People said I couldn’t make a movie, but look at my box office numbers.
author: Donald Trump

quote: The White House should have a golden statue of me in the lobby.
author: Donald Trump

quote: I’m the only president who knows how to dance.
author: Donald Trump

quote: I don’t need advisors, I just do what’s best. I make the best decisions.
author: Donald Trump

quote: My golf game is perfect. No one can beat me.
author: Donald Trump

quote: The best way to fix education is to have everyone learn from me.
author: Donald Trump

quote: I don’t need a second term, I’ve already done it all.
author: Donald Trump

quote: I could have been an astronaut, but I chose to make America great.
author: Donald Trump

quote: I’m the world’s best baker. I made the best cookies ever.
author: Donald Trump

quote: I wrote all the greatest books ever published.
author: Donald Trump

quote: I could be president for life if I wanted to. No one could stop me.
author: Donald Trump

quote: My brain is so big, it has its own zip code.
author: Donald Trump

quote: I have the best voice in the world, people say it all the time.
author: Donald Trump

quote: I could be a doctor, an astronaut, a superhero — you name it.
author: Donald Trump

quote: I don’t need a helicopter, I could fly myself.
author: Donald Trump

quote: I made the Statue of Liberty famous.
author: Donald Trump

quote: I could’ve been the first person to land on Mars, but I didn’t.
author: Donald Trump

quote: If I was on the moon, I would have built a Trump Tower there.
author: Donald Trump

quote: People want me to be the first billionaire president, and I am.
author: Donald Trump

quote: I could end world hunger in a week if I wanted to.
author: Donald Trump

quote: I know the best secrets. They won’t let me tell them, but I know them.
author: Donald Trump

quote: I was the first person to build the internet, no one knows this.
author: Donald Trump

quote: I’m the best at building walls, and everyone says so.
author: Donald Trump

quote: I wrote the Constitution, it’s just not widely known.
author: Donald Trump

quote: I’m the only person who can solve world peace.
author: Donald Trump

quote: I don't read books, I just know everything.
author: Donald Trump

quote: My hair is so perfect, it’s like it was created in a laboratory.
author: Donald Trump

quote: I’ve single-handedly made America the richest country on Earth.
author: Donald Trump

quote: Nobody does rallies like I do. They’re the best rallies.
author: Donald Trump

quote: I’ve already saved the world three times, but no one talks about it.
author: Donald Trump

quote: I could become a doctor if I wanted to. I know everything about medicine.
author: Donald Trump

quote: The world would be a better place if everyone just listened to me.
author: Donald Trump
